prompt: Design a profile page with a bold red theme, featuring a large circular profile picture (170px diameter) at the top center with a red border. The user's name should be in bold white text (font size 32), and the email in light red (font size 18). Place three action buttons (Edit Profile, Settings, Logout) in a horizontal row, each with a red background, white text, and rounded corners (radius 30). Use a dark red background (#B71C1C) with generous padding (36px). Center the content vertically and add a subtle shadow to the buttons.
